description: Get current user billing information. No input required. Returns BillingInfo with subscriptionPlan (String), subscriptionStatus (enum: active, cancelled, expired, trial), subscriptionPeriod (String: monthly, yearly), subscriptionStartedAt (DateTime), subscriptionEndsAt (DateTime), credits (Int), creditLimit (Int), usedCredits (Int), remainingCredits (Int), currentPlan (Plan object), features (array of enabled features). User isolation enforced.
graphql_operation: query GetBilling { billing { billing { subscriptionPlan subscriptionStatus subscriptionPeriod credits creditLimit currentPlan { id name } } } }
